title: Stuck on authentication
body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Stuck on authenticating, have been since last night after update

replies.body: If you haven't yet, do me a favor and check for any firewalls or antivirus that might be blocking your network's access to our servers. It's kinda of rare, but good to check for sure. If that isn't the issue, be sure to try an ethernet connection and the other steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
Run through this, it may help you.
